long_description: Even during an epic training run, the women's Patagonia Strider shorts work to help you remain dry and comfortable. Quick-drying, partially recycled fabric provides air circulation and moisture management, and mesh side seams enhance breathability. Fabric features a Durable Water Repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off. Moisture-wicking, quick drying liner shorts offer a comfortable fit without chafing. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes fit. Internal envelope pocket stores a key or card. Reflective logo improves visibility from any angle. Patagonia Strider shorts offer a regular fit that won't bind or chafe. Closeout.
short_description: Even during an epic training run, the women's Patagonia Strider shorts work to help you remain dry and comfortable.
